price: Anaasε (Ɔkͻmhyεni), wobisa wͻn akatua bi? Wo Wura Nyankopͻn akatua no ne akatua pa, na Ɔno na N’akyɛdeɛ yɛ kyɛn wɔn a wɔkyε adeε no (nyinaa).
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ خَرۡجٗا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum kharjan fakharāju rabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru al-rāziqīna
